characters.name: Pippin
characters.description: A unicorn with a shimmering white coat, a spiraling golden horn, and a flowing mane and tail in shades of pastel rainbow colors.

scenes.background_description: A tranquil meadow at dusk, with gentle hills in the distance and a softly flowing stream reflecting the colors of the sunset. The sky is a gradient of purples, pinks, and oranges as the sun sets on the horizon. A majestic unicorn named Pippin stands gracefully in the center of the scene, with a shimmering horn and a silky, flowing mane. The meadow is lush with vibrant grasses and scattered with soft white daisies. The atmosphere feels magical and serene, embodying an otherworldly charm.
scenes.narration_text: Hello friend, it's Pippin the unicorn.
